item.description:
Every so often, we experience life changing moments that influence us in indescribeable ways. Yours will be this day.

On Saturday August 28th, 2010, TMIRCE will host the greatest day of fun and mayhem ever!!! The run will commence as usual at 10:30am from The Rock.

Immediately following the run, we will go up to Hastings Square (click for details), a 2 min. walk up the street for the following:

WHY THIS DAY IS SPECIAL:

  • Potluck style picnic (bring your favorite picnic items)
  • Pie Eating Contests
  • Banana TOSS
  • Giant Slip and Slide Races
  • Egg on a spoon obstacle course
  • ...and much much more including raffles and prizes!

Good News!!! Mix1 has signed on and will host an obstacle course with some really cool prizes. A whole years worth!!! We are still waiting to hear from BSC and I heard that Ultimate Bootcamp may be stopping by!

Please RSVP for this event and bring some fun stuff! This is going to be the best day ever...


Breakfast Details: Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet at Hastings Square* for the potluck picnic. If you would like to bring a picnic item to share (lunch meat, bagels, fruits, muffins, bread, bacon, potato salad, etc.) please feel free to do so. You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Street parking is easily accessible on Granite Street.

* Hastings Square is located around the corner from the rock on the corner of Brookline St. and Henry St.

informalrunning.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE FIELD DAY of FUN and MAYHEM
